title: bhAramellAm parandAmaniDamE
sahitya:
bhAramellAm parandAmaniDamE vaittu bhakt shei shuddha manamE


anupallavi

  dharaNi anaittaiyum tAngum puruSOttaman dharma rakSakan sAmi sarvAntaryAmi nEmi


caraNam    bhakta parAnkushar pANDava vIrar bhAgavata sukar EkanAthar mIrA
cittaranjanukkE pittAgip-pErinba siddhi aDaindapaDi iddinamum peruvAi
